name: The Rest
description:
'Not all those who are missing are lost.'

You are part of a rescue service known as 'The Rest'.  You find missing people. 

This game has multiple endings. 

Developed as part of the 'I can't write but I want to tell a story' game jam.  Please be aware that this game discusses heavy themes.

Clicking Download will take you to a browser textadventures- it was the only place I could get this game to upload to... Sorry!
